text: Brian Trueman (16 May 1932 â€“ 1 September 2024) was an English writer, broadcaster and voice actor. He was known mainly for his work with the animation studio Cosgrove Hall. He wrote and/or narrated children's cartoon series, mostly during the 1970s and 1980s. Trueman died on 1 September 2024, at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * * http://www.rochellestevens.com/index.php?page=48&text;=Brian_Trueman Category:1932 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from Manchester Category:English television presenters Category:English children's writers Category:English voice actors Category:English television writers Category:English screenwriters
title: Brian Trueman
